publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 84
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa gitit üśt́uńa ulanla- rynyn Qoraḥnyn miźmor. Ńe śuv́ardirĺar toḥtar orunlaryj H Teńrisi cevaʾotnun.
Ḱuśańadir daɣy taryɣadyr ǯanym azbarlaryna H-nyn juŕagim da gufum sarnejdyrlar qajjam Teńriǵa.
Daɣy quš tabadyr juv́uń da qarlyɣač hujasyn öźuńuń ki qojdu čipč́aĺa- rin alej ḿeń klejmiń bolma mizbeaḥlaryj qatyna H Teńrisi cevaʾot- nun Bijim da Teńrim.
Sandyr olturuvčularɣa juv́ujd́a artyḥ maḥtav b́erirĺar saja hamḿeš́a.
Sandyr adamɣa ki kip išansa saja t́uź jyzlar byla juŕakĺarińd́a.
Ašuvčular eniši byla ol jylamaḥnyn coɣaraḥny kibik qojarlar any daɣy lotoqlarny qaplar jamɣur.
Baryrlar midraštan midrašḥa ḱorḿa qyblalaryn Teńriniń Cijon- da.
H Teńrisi cevaʾotnun ešit́kiń tefilamny qulaḥ salɣyn Teńrisi Jaʿaqovnun hamḿeš́a.
Qalqanymyzny ḱorǵuń e Teńri da baḥqyn juźĺariń mašijaḥyjnyn.

Ki jaḥšyraḥtyr bir ḱuń bolma azbarlaryjda miń jyldan eśa sajladym syjynma juv́uńd́a Teńrimniń tiriĺḿakt́ań eśa
čatyrlarynda qynɣyr eĺniń.
Ki qalqan kibik da qujas kibik H Teńri širińlik da syj b́eŕadir H ajamejdyr jaḥšyny üŕuv́č́uĺarǵa t́u- ǵallikĺar byla.
H Teńrisi cevaʾotnun sandyr adamɣa išanuv- čuɣa saja.
